section.title: SolutionStudio Overview
section.para: Automating customization, installation and maintenance of Red Hat Enterprise Linux and CentOS systems today requires costly and complex management solutions. SolutionStudio provides a simple, standard, reliable alternative. SolutionStudio packages user-specified content into standard operating system deployment bundles, or solutions. System solutions can be used to deploy and maintain client machines, physical and virtual, in a wide range of IT environments.
A solution is a set of operating system components, applications and configuration, packaged for deployment in a standard format. Using SolutionStudio you can create and maintain solutions:

listitem.para: combine it with one or more applications,
set operating system and application configuration parameters,
deploy it to clients using standard tools and methods,
update existing clients using standard update tools.

section.para: SolutionStudio reads a solution definition, gathers various inputs (operating system, applications, and configuration files), and creates a solution with installation images and a package repository. Using the installation images, you can deploy the solution to one or more client machines. You can also update existing clients from the solution package repository.

In summary, SolutionStudio is a production system life cycle manager for use in defining, building and maintaining solutions that can be easily installed and updated on physical, virtual and cloud machines using industry standard deployment and update tools.
